sql-mapping.sql-content: SELECT PRODNO OBJNO,ACCTCD,count(1) over(partition by prodno order by prodno) regAcctCd,to_ACCTNAME(ACCTCD) ACCTNAME, amt_01,amt_02,amt_03,amt_04,amt_05,amt_06,amt_07,amt_08,amt_09,amt_10,amt_11,amt_12, sum(amt_01+amt_02+amt_03+amt_04+amt_05+amt_06+amt_07+amt_08+amt_09+amt_10+amt_11+amt_12) over(partition by prodno order by prodno) tot From ( SELECT PRODNO, substr(acctcd,1,4)||'0' ACCTCD, SUM(AMT_01) AMT_01,SUM(AMT_02) AMT_02,SUM(AMT_03) AMT_03,SUM(AMT_04) AMT_04,SUM(AMT_05) AMT_05,SUM(AMT_06) AMT_06, SUM(AMT_07) AMT_07,SUM(AMT_08) AMT_08,SUM(AMT_09) AMT_09,SUM(AMT_10) AMT_10,SUM(AMT_11) AMT_11,SUM(AMT_12) AMT_12 FROM ( SELECT PRODNO, acctcd, case when substr(ym,5,2)='01' then amt end amt_01, case when substr(ym,5,2)='02' then amt end amt_02, case when substr(ym,5,2)='03' then amt end amt_03, case when substr(ym,5,2)='04' then amt end amt_04, case when substr(ym,5,2)='05' then amt end amt_05, case when substr(ym,5,2)='06' then amt end amt_06, case when substr(ym,5,2)='07' then amt end amt_07, case when substr(ym,5,2)='08' then amt end amt_08, case when substr(ym,5,2)='09' then amt end amt_09, case when substr(ym,5,2)='10' then amt end amt_10, case when substr(ym,5,2)='11' then amt end amt_11, case when substr(ym,5,2)='12' then amt end amt_12 FROM ( SELECT ? PRODNO,YM,B.acctcd,NVL(amt,0) AMT FROM ( select costym,substr(acctcd,1,4)||'1' acctcd,amt from CostItem a where version = ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(COSTDESC XPKCOSTDESC)*/ VERSION FROM COSTDESC where prodno = a.prodno and prodtype = a.prodType and costtype = a.costType --and apstatus = 'WCO' and rownum = 1 ) and a.prodNo = ? and a.prodType='P' and costType='T' and costYm like ?||'%' order by costym,acctcd ) A, (select * from (select acctcd from accttb where acctcd like '5%' and acctcd not like '%0') a, (SELECT ?||TRIM(to_char(sn,'00')) ym from months where sn <13)b )B WHERE A.ACCTCD(+)=B.ACCTCD AND A.COSTYM(+)=B.YM ORDER BY B.ACCTCD,YM ) ) GROUP BY PRODNO,substr(acctcd,1,4)||'0' ) union all SELECT PRODNO OBJNO,ACCTCD,0 regAcctCd,ACCTKNAME ACCTNAME, amt_01,amt_02,amt_03,amt_04,amt_05,amt_06,amt_07,amt_08,amt_09,amt_10,amt_11,amt_12, sum(amt_01+amt_02+amt_03+amt_04+amt_05+amt_06+amt_07+amt_08+amt_09+amt_10+amt_11+amt_12) over(partition by prodno order by prodno) tot From ( SELECT PRODNO,ACCTCD,ACCTKNAME, SUM(AMT_01) AMT_01,SUM(AMT_02) AMT_02,SUM(AMT_03) AMT_03,SUM(AMT_04) AMT_04,SUM(AMT_05) AMT_05,SUM(AMT_06) AMT_06, SUM(AMT_07) AMT_07,SUM(AMT_08) AMT_08,SUM(AMT_09) AMT_09,SUM(AMT_10) AMT_10,SUM(AMT_11) AMT_11,SUM(AMT_12) AMT_12 FROM ( SELECT PRODNO, acctcd, acctkname, case when substr(ym,5,2)='01' then amt end amt_01, case when substr(ym,5,2)='02' then amt end amt_02, case when substr(ym,5,2)='03' then amt end amt_03, case when substr(ym,5,2)='04' then amt end amt_04, case when substr(ym,5,2)='05' then amt end amt_05, case when substr(ym,5,2)='06' then amt end amt_06, case when substr(ym,5,2)='07' then amt end amt_07, case when substr(ym,5,2)='08' then amt end amt_08, case when substr(ym,5,2)='09' then amt end amt_09, case when substr(ym,5,2)='10' then amt end amt_10, case when substr(ym,5,2)='11' then amt end amt_11, case when substr(ym,5,2)='12' then amt end amt_12 FROM ( SELECT ? PRODNO,YM,B.acctcd,B.ACCTKNAME,NVL(amt,0) AMT FROM ( select costym,substr(acctcd,1,4)||'1' acctcd,amt from CostItem a where version = ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(COSTDESC XPKCOSTDESC)*/ VERSION FROM COSTDESC where prodno = a.prodno and prodtype = a.prodType and costtype = a.costType --and apstatus = 'WCO' and rownum = 1 ) and a.prodNo = ? and a.prodType='P' and costType='T' and costYm like ?||'%' order by costym,acctcd ) A, (select * from (select acctcd,acctkname from accttb where acctcd like '5%' and acctcd not like '%0') a, (SELECT ?||TRIM(to_char(sn,'00')) ym from months where sn <13)b )B WHERE A.ACCTCD(+)=B.ACCTCD AND A.COSTYM(+)=B.YM ORDER BY B.ACCTCD,YM ) ) GROUP BY PRODNO,ACCTCD,ACCTKNAME )

select a.* , sum(amt_01+amt_02+amt_03+amt_04+amt_05+amt_06+amt_07+amt_08+amt_09+amt_10+amt_11+amt_12) over(partition by OBJNO,acctcd order by OBJNO) tot from ( select ? OBJNO,B.acctcd acctcd,count(1) over(partition by 1 order by 1) regAcctCd,B.ACCTKNAME ACCTNAME, case when startdt<=?01 and enddt>=?01 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_01, case when startdt<=?02 and enddt>=?02 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_02, case when startdt<=?03 and enddt>=?03 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_03, case when startdt<=?04 and enddt>=?04 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_04, case when startdt<=?05 and enddt>=?05 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_05, case when startdt<=?06 and enddt>=?06 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_06, case when startdt<=?07 and enddt>=?07 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_07, case when startdt<=?08 and enddt>=?08 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_08, case when startdt<=?09 and enddt>=?09 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_09, case when startdt<=?10 and enddt>=?10 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_10, case when startdt<=?11 and enddt>=?11 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_11, case when startdt<=?12 and enddt>=?12 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_12 from ( select prodno,prodtype,costtype,costym, case when a.acctcd='91300' then case when sn='1' then '50020' when sn='2' then '50030' when sn='3' then '50060' end else a.acctcd end acctcd, case when a.acctcd='91300' then case when sn='1' then trunc(amt*0.567) when sn='2' then trunc(amt*0.355) when sn='3' then trunc(amt*0.078) end else amt end amt ,enddt,startdt from ( select a.prodno,a.prodtype,costtype,costym,acctcd, trunc(amt/(months_between(to_date(substr(b.plenddt,1,6),'yyyymm'),to_date(substr(b.plstartdt,1,6),'yyyymm'))+1)) amt, substr(b.plenddt,1,6) enddt,substr(b.plstartdt,1,6) startdt from CostItem a,prod b where version = ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(COSTDESC XPKCOSTDESC)*/ VERSION FROM COSTDESC where prodno = a.prodno and prodtype = a.prodType and costtype = a.costType --and apstatus = 'WCO' and rownum = 1 ) and a.prodNo = ? and a.prodType='P' and costType='E' and b.prodno=a.prodNo and b.prodtype=a.prodType )a, (select sn,'91300' acctcd from months where sn<4 ) b where a.acctcd=b.acctcd(+) )a, (select acctcd,acctkname from accttb where acctcd like '5%%%0' ) b where a.acctcd(+)= b.acctcd order by acctcd )a union all select a.* , sum(amt_01+amt_02+amt_03+amt_04+amt_05+amt_06+amt_07+amt_08+amt_09+amt_10+amt_11+amt_12) over(partition by OBJNO,acctcd order by OBJNO) tot from ( select ? OBJNO,B.acctcd acctcd,0 regAcctCd,B.ACCTKNAME ACCTNAME, case when startdt<=?01 and enddt>=?01 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_01, case when startdt<=?02 and enddt>=?02 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_02, case when startdt<=?03 and enddt>=?03 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_03, case when startdt<=?04 and enddt>=?04 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_04, case when startdt<=?05 and enddt>=?05 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_05, case when startdt<=?06 and enddt>=?06 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_06, case when startdt<=?07 and enddt>=?07 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_07, case when startdt<=?08 and enddt>=?08 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_08, case when startdt<=?09 and enddt>=?09 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_09, case when startdt<=?10 and enddt>=?10 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_10, case when startdt<=?11 and enddt>=?11 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_11, case when startdt<=?12 and enddt>=?12 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_12 from ( select prodno,prodtype,costtype,costym, case when a.acctcd='91301' then case when sn='1' then '50021' when sn='2' then '50031' when sn='3' then '50061' end else a.acctcd end acctcd, case when a.acctcd='91301' then case when sn='1' then trunc(amt*0.567) when sn='2' then trunc(amt*0.355) when sn='3' then trunc(amt*0.078) end else amt end amt ,enddt,startdt from ( select a.prodno,a.prodtype,costtype,costym,substr(acctcd,1,4)||'1' acctcd, trunc(amt/(months_between(to_date(substr(b.plenddt,1,6),'yyyymm'),to_date(substr(b.plstartdt,1,6),'yyyymm'))+1)) amt, substr(b.plenddt,1,6) enddt,substr(b.plstartdt,1,6) startdt from CostItem a,prod b where version = ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(COSTDESC XPKCOSTDESC)*/ VERSION FROM COSTDESC where prodno = a.prodno and prodtype = a.prodType and costtype = a.costType --and apstatus = 'WCO' and rownum = 1 ) and a.prodNo = ? and a.prodType='P' and costType='E' and b.prodno=a.prodNo and b.prodtype=a.prodType )a, (select sn,'91301' acctcd from months where sn<4 ) b where a.acctcd=b.acctcd(+) )a, (select acctcd,acctkname from accttb where acctcd like '5%' and acctcd not like '%0') b where a.acctcd(+)= b.acctcd order by acctcd )a

SELECT ORGCD OBJNO,count(1) over(partition by orgcd order by orgcd) regAcctCd,ACCTCD,ACCTKNAME ACCTNAME, amt_01,amt_02,amt_03,amt_04,amt_05,amt_06,amt_07,amt_08,amt_09,amt_10,amt_11,amt_12, sum(amt_01+amt_02+amt_03+amt_04+amt_05+amt_06+amt_07+amt_08+amt_09+amt_10+amt_11+amt_12) over(partition by ORGCD order by ORGCD) tot From ( SELECT ORGCD,ACCTCD,ACCTKNAME, SUM(AMT_01) AMT_01,SUM(AMT_02) AMT_02,SUM(AMT_03) AMT_03,SUM(AMT_04) AMT_04,SUM(AMT_05) AMT_05,SUM(AMT_06) AMT_06, SUM(AMT_07) AMT_07,SUM(AMT_08) AMT_08,SUM(AMT_09) AMT_09,SUM(AMT_10) AMT_10,SUM(AMT_11) AMT_11,SUM(AMT_12) AMT_12 FROM ( SELECT orgcd, acctcd, acctkname, case when substr(ym,5,2)='01' then amt end amt_01, case when substr(ym,5,2)='02' then amt end amt_02, case when substr(ym,5,2)='03' then amt end amt_03, case when substr(ym,5,2)='04' then amt end amt_04, case when substr(ym,5,2)='05' then amt end amt_05, case when substr(ym,5,2)='06' then amt end amt_06, case when substr(ym,5,2)='07' then amt end amt_07, case when substr(ym,5,2)='08' then amt end amt_08, case when substr(ym,5,2)='09' then amt end amt_09, case when substr(ym,5,2)='10' then amt end amt_10, case when substr(ym,5,2)='11' then amt end amt_11, case when substr(ym,5,2)='12' then amt end amt_12 FROM ( select ? orgcd,b.ym, b.acctcd,b.acctkname,nvl(trunc(A.amt),0) amt from ( select ym,SUBSTR(acctcd,1,4)||'0' acctcd,sum(amt) amt from realCostInfo where orgcd=? and ym like ?||'%' and acctcd not in (select distinct acctcd from acctstdcost) group by ym,acctcd union all select ym, SUBSTR(acctcd,1,4)||'0' acctcd, sum(amt) amt from ( select ym,acctcd,cnt*value amt from ( select distinct count(egrade) over(partition by egrade order by 1) cnt , a.egrade,b.orgcd from empall a,org b where b.orgcd=? and a.orgCd=b.orgCd ) a,(select acctcd,type,value from acctstdcost)b, (select ?||trim(to_char(sn,'00')) ym from months where sn<13)c where b.type=a.EGRADE ) group by ym, acctcd
)A, (select * from (select acctcd,acctkname from accttb where acctcd like '5%%%0') a, (SELECT ?||TRIM(to_char(sn,'00')) ym from months where sn <13)b )B where a.acctcd (+)= b.acctcd and a.ym(+) = b.ym ) )group by ORGCD,ACCTCD,ACCTKNAME ) UNION ALL SELECT ORGCD,to_number(ACCTCD),ACCTCD,ACCTKNAME, amt_01,amt_02,amt_03,amt_04,amt_05,amt_06,amt_07,amt_08,amt_09,amt_10,amt_11,amt_12, sum(amt_01+amt_02+amt_03+amt_04+amt_05+amt_06+amt_07+amt_08+amt_09+amt_10+amt_11+amt_12) over(partition by ORGCD order by ORGCD) tot From ( SELECT ORGCD,ACCTCD,ACCTKNAME, SUM(AMT_01) AMT_01,SUM(AMT_02) AMT_02,SUM(AMT_03) AMT_03,SUM(AMT_04) AMT_04,SUM(AMT_05) AMT_05,SUM(AMT_06) AMT_06, SUM(AMT_07) AMT_07,SUM(AMT_08) AMT_08,SUM(AMT_09) AMT_09,SUM(AMT_10) AMT_10,SUM(AMT_11) AMT_11,SUM(AMT_12) AMT_12 FROM ( SELECT orgcd, acctcd, acctkname, case when substr(ym,5,2)='01' then amt end amt_01, case when substr(ym,5,2)='02' then amt end amt_02, case when substr(ym,5,2)='03' then amt end amt_03, case when substr(ym,5,2)='04' then amt end amt_04, case when substr(ym,5,2)='05' then amt end amt_05, case when substr(ym,5,2)='06' then amt end amt_06, case when substr(ym,5,2)='07' then amt end amt_07, case when substr(ym,5,2)='08' then amt end amt_08, case when substr(ym,5,2)='09' then amt end amt_09, case when substr(ym,5,2)='10' then amt end amt_10, case when substr(ym,5,2)='11' then amt end amt_11, case when substr(ym,5,2)='12' then amt end amt_12 FROM ( select ? orgcd,b.ym, b.acctcd,b.acctkname,nvl(trunc(A.amt),0) amt from ( select ym,acctcd,sum(amt) amt from realCostInfo where orgcd=? and ym like ?||'%' and acctcd not in (select distinct acctcd from acctstdcost) group by ym,acctcd union all select ym, acctcd, sum(amt) amt from ( select ym,acctcd,cnt*value amt from ( select distinct count(egrade) over(partition by egrade order by 1) cnt , a.egrade,b.orgcd from empall a,org b where b.orgcd=? and a.orgCd=b.orgCd ) a,(select acctcd,type,value from acctstdcost)b, (select ?||trim(to_char(sn,'00')) ym from months where sn<13)c where b.type=a.EGRADE ) group by ym, acctcd )A, (select * from (select acctcd,acctkname from accttb where acctcd like '5%' and not acctcd like '%0') a, (SELECT ?||TRIM(to_char(sn,'00')) ym from months where sn <13)b )B where a.acctcd(+)= b.acctcd and a.ym(+) = b.ym ) )group by ORGCD,ACCTCD,ACCTKNAME )
delete from detailYearPlan where yPlanCd=? and dyPlanCd=?
delete from budgetPlan where yPlanCd=? and dyPlanCd=? and isDefault='C' and acctCd like '5%'
update detailYearPlan set dyPlanStatus=? where yPlanCd=? and dyPlanCd=?

select yplancd,dyplancd,dyPlanName,dyplanstatus flag,nvl( ( select tot from ( select jobno, tot from (select jobno,contAmt tot from orderAmtView ) a, ( select dyplanCd from detailYearPlan where not orgCd in ( SELECT ORGCD FROM ORG A WHERE ORG_NO IN (SELECT ORG_NO FROM ORGHISTORY WHERE ENDDT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) CONNECT BY A.HIGHORGCD = PRIOR TO_CHAR(A.ORG_NO) START WITH A.ORGCD = 'R025' ) )b where a.jobno=b.dyplancd ) where jobno=dyplancd ),0) amt_01,sum(amt_02) amt_02,sum(amt_03) amt_03 from ( select yplancd,dyplancd, grpCd ,dyPlanName,dyplanstatus, case when grpCd='A' then tot else 0 end amt_02, case when grpCd='B' then tot else 0 end amt_03 from ( select case when substr(acctcd,1,1)='5' then 'A' else 'B' end grpCd, a.tot,b.dyPlanName,b.dyplanstatus,b.yPlanCd,a.dyplanCd from budgetview a, detailYearPlan b where isDefault='C' and a.yPlanCd=? and a.dyPlanCd like '%'||?||'%' and a.yPlanCd=b.yPlanCd and a.dyPlanCd=b.dyPlanCd )a )group by yplancd,dyplancd,dyPlanName,dyplanstatus

insert into goodplan(yplancd,dyplancd,goodcd,goodname,gooddt,count,goodprice,goodsum,goodnote,acctcd) select ?,?, (select nvl(max(goodCd),to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd')||'0000') goodCd from goodPlan where substr(goodCd,1,8)= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') ) + rownum goodCd, itemName goodname,nvl(substr(itemInputDt,1,6),'?01') gooddt, itemQuantity count, itemUnPrice goodprice , itemQuantity * itemUnPrice goodsum, mercInputNote goodnote, case when mercType='HW' or mercType='NW' then '50011' else '50012' end acctcd from mercinput A, prod B where a.prodno=? and a.prodType='P' and b.prodno=a.prodno and '?01'<=nvl(substr(itemInputDt,1,6),'?01') and '?12'>=nvl(substr(itemInputDt,1,6),'?01')

insert into budgetPlan select ? yplanCd, ? dyplanCd, B.acctcd , 'C' isDefault, case when startdt<=?01 and enddt>=?01 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_01, case when startdt<=?02 and enddt>=?02 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_02, case when startdt<=?03 and enddt>=?03 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_03, case when startdt<=?04 and enddt>=?04 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_04, case when startdt<=?05 and enddt>=?05 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_05, case when startdt<=?06 and enddt>=?06 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_06, case when startdt<=?07 and enddt>=?07 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_07, case when startdt<=?08 and enddt>=?08 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_08, case when startdt<=?09 and enddt>=?09 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_09, case when startdt<=?10 and enddt>=?10 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_10, case when startdt<=?11 and enddt>=?11 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_11, case when startdt<=?12 and enddt>=?12 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_12,' ' budgetPlanNote,? crEmpid from ( select prodno,prodtype,costtype,costym, case when a.acctcd='91301' then case when sn='1' then '50021' when sn='2' then '50031' when sn='3' then '50061' end else a.acctcd end acctcd, case when a.acctcd='91301' then case when sn='1' then trunc(amt*0.567) when sn='2' then trunc(amt*0.355) when sn='3' then trunc(amt*0.078) end else amt end amt ,enddt,startdt from ( select a.prodno,a.prodtype,costtype,costym,substr(acctcd,1,4)||'1' acctcd, trunc(amt/(months_between(to_date(substr(b.plenddt,1,6),'yyyymm'),to_date(substr(b.plstartdt,1,6),'yyyymm'))+1)) amt, substr(b.plenddt,1,6) enddt,substr(b.plstartdt,1,6) startdt from CostItem a,prod b where version = ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(COSTDESC XPKCOSTDESC)*/ VERSION FROM COSTDESC where prodno = a.prodno and prodtype = a.prodType and costtype = a.costType --and apstatus = 'WCO' and rownum = 1 ) and a.prodNo = ? and a.prodType='P' and costType='E' and b.prodno=a.prodNo and b.prodtype=a.prodType )a, (select sn,'91301' acctcd from months where sn<4 ) b where a.acctcd=b.acctcd(+) )a, (select acctcd,acctkname from accttb where acctcd like '5%' and acctcd not like '%0') b where a.acctcd(+)= b.acctcd order by acctcd

insert into hrPlan select yplancd,dyplancd,emptype,hrplandt,sum(hrcount) hrcount , hrnote from ( select ? yplancd,? dyplancd,emptype, case when sn=1 then '?01' when sn=2 then '?02' when sn=3 then '?03' when sn=4 then '?04' when sn=5 then '?05' when sn=6 then '?06' when sn=7 then '?07' when sn=8 then '?08' when sn=9 then '?09' when sn=10 then '?10' when sn=11 then '?11' when sn=12 then '?12' end hrplandt, case when sn=1 then amt_01 when sn=2 then amt_02 when sn=3 then amt_03 when sn=4 then amt_04 when sn=5 then amt_05 when sn=6 then amt_06 when sn=7 then amt_07 when sn=8 then amt_08 when sn=9 then amt_09 when sn=10 then amt_10 when sn=11 then amt_11 when sn=12 then amt_12 end hrcount,' 'hrnote from ( select B.cd empType, case when startdt<=?01 and enddt>=?01 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_01, case when startdt<=?02 and enddt>=?02 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_02, case when startdt<=?03 and enddt>=?03 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_03, case when startdt<=?04 and enddt>=?04 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_04, case when startdt<=?05 and enddt>=?05 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_05, case when startdt<=?06 and enddt>=?06 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_06, case when startdt<=?07 and enddt>=?07 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_07, case when startdt<=?08 and enddt>=?08 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_08, case when startdt<=?09 and enddt>=?09 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_09, case when startdt<=?10 and enddt>=?10 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_10, case when startdt<=?11 and enddt>=?11 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_11, case when startdt<=?12 and enddt>=?12 then NVL(amt,0) else 0 end AMT_12 from ( select grade, trunc(sum(manmth)/(months_between(to_date(enddt,'yyyymm'),to_date(startdt,'yyyymm'))+1) ,1) amt, enddt,startdt from ( select case when grade in ('AB','AC','AD','AE','AF') then grade else 'B0' end grade, manmth, substr(b.plenddt,1,6) enddt,substr(b.plstartdt,1,6) startdt from hrinput a, prod b where a.prodtype='P' and a.prodno=? and b.prodtype=a.prodtype and b.prodno =a.prodno )group by grade,enddt,startdt )a, (select cd ,cdname from cocode where cdtype='EA' and cd in ('AB','AC','AD','AE','AF','B0') ) b where a.grade(+)=b.cd order by cd ) a, (select sn from months where sn<13)b ) group by yplancd,dyplancd,emptype,hrplandt, hrnote

select a.yPlanCd,a.dyPlanCd,dyPlanName,dyPlanStatus, contAmt amt_01,cost amt_02, profit amt_03,profitLoss amt_04, b.mm amt_05,c.investcost amt_06, yearPlanType from ( select yplancd,dyplancd,dyPlanName,dyplanstatus, nvl(max(contAmt),0) as contAmt, sum(cost) cost,sum(profit) profit ,sum(profit)-sum(cost) profitLoss,yearPlanType from ( select yplancd,dyplancd, grpCd ,dyPlanName,dyplanstatus,yearPlanType, case when grpCd='A' then tot else 0 end cost, case when grpCd='B' then tot else 0 end profit from ( select case when substr(acctcd,1,1)='5' then 'A' else 'B' end grpCd, amt_01+amt_02+amt_03+amt_04+amt_05+amt_06+amt_07+amt_08+amt_09+amt_10+amt_11+amt_12 tot, b.dyPlanName,b.dyplanstatus,b.yPlanCd,b.dyplanCd,yearPlanType from budgetPlan a, detailYearPlan b where a.isDefault='C' and b.yPlanCd=? and b.orgCd in ( SELECT ORGCD FROM ORG A WHERE ORG_NO IN (SELECT ORG_NO FROM ORGHISTORY WHERE ENDDT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) START WITH A.ORGCD = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR TO_CHAR(A.ORG_NO)=A.HIGHORGCD ) and a.yPlanCd=b.yPlanCd and a.dyPlanCd=b.dyPlanCd )a ) a,new_orderAmtView b where b.jobno(+)=a.dyplancd group by yplancd,dyplancd,dyPlanName,dyplanstatus,yearPlanType )a, ( select yplancd,dyplancd,sum(mm) mm from ( select yplancd,dyplancd,tot mm from hrview UNION ALL select yplancd,dyplancd,hrcount mm from hrplan ) where yPlanCd=? group by yplancd, dyplancd )b, ( select b.dyplancd,sum(amt) investCost from ivPlan a, detailYearPlan b where b.yPlanCd=? and b.orgCd in ( SELECT ORGCD FROM ORG A WHERE ORG_NO IN (SELECT ORG_NO FROM ORGHISTORY WHERE ENDDT >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) START WITH A.ORGCD = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR TO_CHAR(A.ORG_NO)=A.HIGHORGCD ) and a.dyplancd=b.dyplancd and a.yplancd=b.YPLANCD group by b.dyplancd )c where a.dyplancd=b.dyplancd and a.dyplancd=c.dyplancd(+)

AS CREMPID FROM BUDGETPLAN D WHERE D.YPLANCD =A.YPLANCD AND D.DYPLANCD=A.DYPLANCD AND D.ISDEFAULT IN ('F','C') AND D.ACCTCD=A.ACCTCD ) WHERE (A.YPLANCD,A.DYPLANCD,A.ACCTCD) IN (SELECT YPLANCD,DYPLANCD,ACCTCD FROM BUDGETPLAN C WHERE C.YPLANCD =A.YPLANCD AND C.DYPLANCD=A.DYPLANCD AND C.ISDEFAULT='F') AND A.YPLANCD =? AND A.DYPLANCD=? AND A.ISDEFAULT = 'C'
